Subskills.name: Event Horizon
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by black hole.

Subskills.name: Super Massive
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of black hole.

Subskills.name: Galaxy Devouring Growth
Subskills.description: Chance to frequently grow larger over time gaining increased damage. Black hole duration is decreased.

Subskills.name: Time = Space
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of black hole.

Subskills.name: Mass Density
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of black hole.

Subskills.name: Interstellar Radiation
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash cosmic flares from the center of the black hole towards targets on hit dealing a portion of its damage.

Subskills.name: Watermelting Cold
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict frostbite on hit.

Subskills.name: Time Bender
Subskills.description: Reduces the cooldown of black hole.

Subskills.name: Empowered Singularity
Subskills.description: Black hole rapidly pulls monsters towards its singularity on hit before expiring. Black hole no longer has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Time Traveler
Subskills.description: Gain increased movement speed and phasing for a short duration when inside the black hole.

Subskills.name: Subzero Frequency
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frostbitten targets.

Subskills.name: Singularity
Subskills.description: Chance to rapidly pull monsters towards the singularity on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Hidden in Plain Sight
Subskills.description: Summon multiple smaller orbiting black holes dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Supermassive Black Hole
Subskills.description: Summon a supermassive black hole dealing a portion of the damage frequently draining a portion of your maximum mana. Running out of mana causes the black hole to expire.
